chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> incls (Iter_rem m x) (fmap_to_set m)

Premises:
dart = nat : Set
exd = fix exd (m : fmap) (x : dart) {struct m} : Prop := match m with | V => False | I m0 x0 _ _ => x0 = x \/ exd m0 x | L m0 _ _ _ => exd m0 x end : fmap -> dart -> Prop
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
fmap_to_set = fix fmap_to_set (m : fmap) : set := match m with | V => Vs | I m0 x _ _ => Is (fmap_to_set m0) x | L m0 _ _ _ => fmap_to_set m0 end : fmap -> set
Inductive incls (s1 s2 : set) : Prop := exds2 : (forall z : dart, exds s1 z -> exds s2 z) -> incls s1 s2 For exds2: Argument scopes are [_ _ function_scope]
Iter_rem = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) => Iter_rem_aux m z (fmap_to_set m) : fmap -> dart -> set
incls_orbit : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> incls (Iter_orb m x) (fmap_to_set m)
exds_orb_exd : forall (m : fmap) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exds (Iter_orb m x) z -> exd m z
Iter_orb = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) => set_minus (fmap_to_set m) (Iter_rem m z) : fmap -> dart -> set
B_1_not_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m x -> B_1 m k x = m
B_not_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ exd m x -> B m k x = m
exds_rem_orb : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m t -> ~ exds (Iter_rem m z) t < -> exds (Iter_orb m z) t
A_cA : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> A m k x = y -> cA m k x = y
A_1_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> A_1 m k x = y -> cA_1 m k x = y
L3 : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (x : set), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds x t -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z x in let zn0 := Iter (f m) (ndN m - card x) z in ~ exds sr t -> exds x zn0
top_top_bottom_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> top m k x = top m k y -> bottom m k x = bottom m k y
bottom_bottom_top_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> bottom m k x = bottom m k y -> top m k x = top m k y
upb_pos_aux : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), exd m z -> (card (Iter_rem m z) < ndN m)%nat
bottom_bottom_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> ~ succ m k y -> bottom m k x = bottom m k y -> top m k x = y
top_top_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> ~ pred m k y -> top m k x = top m k y -> bottom m k x = y
L2 : forall (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (x : set), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds x t -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z x in let zn0 := Iter (f m) (ndN m - card x) z in ~ exds sr t -> exds x zn0 -> ~ exds (Iter_rem_aux m z (Ds x zn0)) t
exd_Iter_upb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m (Iter (f m) (Iter_upb m z) z)
PL3 = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (x : set) => inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds x t -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z x in let zn0 := Iter (f m) (ndN m - card x) z in ~ exds sr t -> exds x zn0 : fmap -> dart -> dart -> set -> Prop
PL2 = fun (m : fmap) (z t : dart) (x : set) => inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exds x t -> let sr := Iter_rem_aux m z x in let zn0 := Iter (f m) (ndN m - card x) z in ~ exds sr t -> exds x zn0 -> ~ exds (Iter_rem_aux m z (Ds x zn0)) t : fmap -> dart -> dart -> set -> Prop
exd_exds : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), exd m z < -> exds (fmap_to_set m) z
degree_per : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter (f m) (degree m z) z = z
exd_diff_orb : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> diff_orb m z
exd_cA_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m (cA m k z) -> exd m z
exd_A_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m (A m k z) -> exd m z
exd_cA_1_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m (cA_1 m k z) -> exd m z
exd_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m (bottom m k z)
exd_A_1_exd : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m (A_1 m k z) -> exd m z
exd_top : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m (top m k z)
modulo : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), dart -> inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> nat
degree_diff : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> forall i : nat, (0 < i < degree m z)%nat -> Iter (f m) i z <> z
exd_Iter_f : forall (m : fmap) (n : nat) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (Iter (f m) n z)

```coq
```coq
intros m x Hinv_Hexd.
induction m using fmap_ind; simpl.
- (* V *)
  intros. simpl. rewrite <- IHm. auto.
- (* I *)
  intros. simpl. rewrite <- IHm1. auto.
- (* L *)
  intros. simpl. rewrite <- IHm. auto.
rewrite <- incls_orbit. auto.
Qed.
